page.title: 18THE CHANGING POPULATION (ii)
page.content: Thorn Hamlet is an example of a middle class population where the occupants are extremely active in the local community. A retired headmaster and Chaplain to the Queen takes church services in Chagford;a retired colonial policeman who speaks fluent Chinese acts as interpreter for Crown and Police Court cases;his wife is President of the Devon Embroiderers' Guild, a lecturer and judge for horticultural produce and craft work. A retired secretary is Treasurer of the Chagford branch of the W.E.A.,a member of the W.I.,the R.S.P.C.A. and Ramblers Association. There are also a computer programmer with a large young family, a sales representative with 6 children 5-18yrs.,a hotel proprietor,a teacher and a medical secretary,a widow over 85 and 2 retired ladies who farm beef cattle on a smallholding.
